Job Description: What you'll do:      Design and development of new features on BTS/nodeB/eNodbe    writing system and design specification and unit test plan    Taking the ownership of the feature and work with cross functional teams to successful delivery of the feature    Understanding of end to end scenario and troubleshooting/fixing of field and QA reported issues       What you must have:      Minimum 06-10 years experience in 1 RAT development    Protocol development experience in WCDMA/HSPA    strong hold on C, C , SW architecture    Good understanding of best practice software engineering processes, version control, testing and release cycles    Strong communication skills    Excellent understanding of 3GPP standards    Solid understanding of Linux OS internals, TCP/IP, multi-threading    Excellent verbal and written communication skills are required    Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills      Education:      Bachelor s (B.E/ B.Tech ) or Master s degree (M.E. or M.Tech .) in Computer Science/Electronics/Electronics Telecommunication Engineering or equivalent training, education and experience.
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial, Any Graduate in Any Specialization
PG: M.Tech in Electronics/Telecommunication, Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization
